front.title: A Socket Intents Prototype for the BSD Socket API - Experiences, Lessons Learned and Considerations

abstract.t: This document describes a prototype implementation of Socket Intents [I-D.tiesel-taps-socketintents] for the BSD Socket API as an illustrative example how Socket Intents could be implemented. It described the experiences made with the prototype and lessons learned from trying to extend the BSD Socket API.
